thread.title: Texas school district makes changes after FFRF complaint (Freedom from Religion Foundation)

author: wn.com
title: Texas school district makes changes after FFRF complaint (Freedom from Religion Foundation)
text: ( Source : Freedom from Religion Foundation ) A Texas school district will no longer allow the high school principal to preach to students at a student-led prayer event or set up a religious after-school club after the Freedom From Religion
